title: Installing the automation services catalog worker
subtitle: Extend your Red Hat Ansible Automation Platform to connect with automation services catalog on cloud.redhat.com using the Ansible Automation Platform 2.0 Setup or Setup Bundle Installers
abstract:
Providing Feedback: <<<<<<< HEAD
If you have a suggestion to improve this documentation, or find an error, create an issue at http://issues.redhat.com. Select the Ansible Automation Platform project and use the Documentationcomponent. =======
If you have a suggestion to improve this documentation, or find an error, please contact technical support at to create an issue on the Ansible Automation Platform Jira project using the Docs component. >>>>>>> be3d6ec... AAP-2853 Update Providing feedback info (#285) (#286)
